summary: An American scientist creates a half-pterodactyl, half-barracuda creature, Pteracuda, which inevitably escapes, leaving the Sharktopus to stop it.

keywords: no survivors|psychotronic film|scientist|tentacled creature|half shark half octopus
title: Sharktopus vs. Pteracuda
